tool_description: API to provide amazon products data
title: Amazon-Products-API

api_list.name: Product Data
api_list.description: Retrieves product data given ASIN and host.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-products-api.p.rapidapi.com/get-product-data"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-products-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Home
api_list.description: Home Route to show usage message
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-products-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-products-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-products-api.p.rapidapi.com/get-product-data"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-products-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
